info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 4:22PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Showers and thunderstorms with gusty outflow winds will impact portions of Washington and south central Iron Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 420 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gunlock State Park to 19 miles south of Sand Hollow State Park. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Zion National Park, St George, Washington, Hurricane, Santa Clara, La Verkin, Dameron Valley, Quail Creek State Park, Sand Hollow State Park, Gunlock State Park, Apple Valley, Ivins, Hildale, Enterprise, Toquerville, Leeds, Virgin, Springdale, Rockville and Pintura. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 1 and 35. Utah Route 18 between mile markers 0 and 46. Utah Route 56 between mile markers 28 and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
